content:
Convert the following page segment ({image_url}), using the context of the full page it came from ({page_image_url}) if necessary, to HTML. Convert tables into HTML tables
- Describe any images, charts, diagrams, or visuals in text
- Convert formulas to in text latex HTML format
- Preserve all content from the original page
- Maintain the original structure and organization

Return ONLY the HTML markup enclosed in ```html``` tags.
